column3: in this case you'll probably want to remove the RUN_BENCH logic from travis as it does pretty much the same (introduced in #13811)\nping @MarcoFalke
@laanwj Yes, that is my plan if @MarcoFalke is OK with it :-)
I don't see any downside to doing this. So Concept ACK, but I can't review build system changes.
